lead_paragraph: In a speech, Judge Raymond J. Dearie echoed the concerns of other federal judges in Brooklyn who have offered scathing appraisals of mandatory sentencing guidelines.

headline.print_headline: Judge Calls for End to ‘Madness of Mass Incarceration’
headline.main: Federal Judge Urges U.S. to ‘Jettison the Madness of Mass Incarceration’

snippet: In a speech, Judge Raymond J. Dearie echoed the concerns of other federal judges in Brooklyn who have offered scathing appraisals of mandatory sentencing guidelines.
abstract: Judge Raymond J Dearie of Federal District Court in Brooklyn, in speech at event held by New York Criminal Bar Assn, calls for end to mass incarceration and urges nation to find alternatives to harsh sentencing laws; speech puts Dearie in growing group of judges who have come out against mandatory sentencing and disregard of socioeconomic roots of crime.
